---
title: "Sony"
description: "PTP Sony definitions"
---

# Sony

## Aperture

**Code:** `0x5007`

Get/Set the aperture value.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

---

## ShutterSpeed

**Code:** `0xd20d`

Get/Set the shutter speed.

**Datatype:** UINT32

**Access:** GetSet

---

## Iso

**Code:** `0xd21e`

Get/Set the ISO sensitivity.

**Datatype:** UINT32

**Access:** GetSet

---

## Exposure

**Code:** `0x0`

Exposure (either metered or manually set)

**Datatype:** INT16

**Access:** Get

---

## MeteredExposure

**Code:** `0xd1b5`

AKA Metered Manual Level - Get the metered manual level.

**Datatype:** INT16

**Access:** GetSet

---

## ExposureCompensation

**Code:** `0x5010`

AKA Exposure Bias Compensation - Get/Set the exposure bias compensation.

**Datatype:** INT16

**Access:** GetSet

---

## StillCaptureMode

**Code:** `0x5013`

Get/Set the drive mode.

**Datatype:** UINT32

**Access:** GetSet

---

## OsdImageMode

**Code:** `0xd207`

Get/Set the OSD image mode

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** GetSet

---

## LiveViewStatus

**Code:** `0xd221`

Get the live view status.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** Get

---

## StillImageSaveDestination

**Code:** `0xd222`

Get the information of still image save destination.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** GetSet

---

## PositionKeySetting

**Code:** `0xd25a`

Get/Set the position key setting (controls which setting takes priority between host and camera)

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** GetSet

---

## SetLiveViewEnable

**Code:** `0xd313`

Set live view enable. When using Live View while connected in "Remote Control with Transfer Mode," it is necessary to enable the feature using this Control Code.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

---

## SetPostViewEnable

**Code:** `0xd312`

Set post view enable. When using Live View while connected in "Remote Control with Transfer Mode," it is necessary to enable the feature using this Control Code.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

---

## ShootingFileInfo

**Code:** `0xd215`

Get the shooting file info. 0x0000 indicates no files are available, 0x0001 - 0x7FFF indicate files exist. 0x8001 and over indicate the files are ready for transfer.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** Get

---

## ShutterHalfReleaseButton

**Code:** `0xd2c1`

Control shutter half-release (S1) (focus) button.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

---

## ShutterReleaseButton

**Code:** `0xd2c2`

Control shutter release (S2) button.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

---

## S1S2Button

**Code:** `0xd2e6`

Execute shutter half-release (S1) and shutter release (S2) buttons.

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

---

## MovieRecButton

**Code:** `0xd2c8`

Control movie record button (hold)

**Datatype:** UINT16

**Access:** GetSet

---

## LiveViewImageQuality

**Code:** `0xd26a`

Get/Set the live view image quality.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** GetSet

---

## ContentTransferEnable

**Code:** `0xd295`

Get the contents transfer enabled status.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** Get

---

## FocusIndication

**Code:** `0xd213`

Get the focus indication.

**Datatype:** UINT8

**Access:** Get

---
